entry.title: $2100 // beautiful, large 1 bedroom/NO FEE/Bedstuy/Brooklyn
entry.content:
Stunning 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom apartment have an abundance of sunlight. Situated in the middle BedStuy, this one bedroom comes with:

Listing Details: 
Date Available-September 1st 
Listing Price- $2,100 
Pet Policy-Pets Allowed


Features:

Natural, soft light
Hardwood floors
Exposed bricks
Stainless steel appliance with dishwasher
Full Bathrooms with soaking tub and vanity
Spacious living room for entertaining guests
Laundry in building
NO FEE


Location:

Close to A, C, S trains, B26, B25 and B44 buses, and LIRR
Close to grocery stores, Deli's, bakeries, cafes, pharmacies, various restaurants, Citi Bikes, Planet Fitness, The THNK 1994 Museum, St. Andrews Playground, Brower Park, St. Johns Park Library, UPS Store, Edible Arrangements and Greedi Vegan.



Contact Angel show contact info for a viewing.

Perfect to make a home :)
